name: Starlight Weaponaire
description:
Welcome, Recruit, to Starlight Weaponaire, an easy idle clicker game set in the Starlight Universe!

World War IV is upon us, and our defense is at an all time low!

You are the deciding factor in the greatest conflict of the next century!

Manage the United Star Force's orbital shipyard and produce fighters, vehicles and prefab structures to help us win the conflict.

Begin by tapping on the Grak 9mm P-37 Pistol image. Keep clicking until you can buy one! Now you're ready to dive in!

Assign engineers, purchase surges, impress the admiralty and ready our forces for combat!

Conquer the USF's foe in the new Proving Grounds!

Starlight Weaponaire - because we can't win the war without you!

Visit us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/Weaponaire/
